entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Baie-James
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 56 %

Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: SSE 35 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
